programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: Laurie Strode is still tormented by her ordeal with killer Michael Myers 20 years on. When she learns that he has escaped once again, she becomes convinced he will track her down

programme.title: Sweet Sixteen
programme.desc: Gritty social-realist drama. Determined to have a normal family life once his mother gets out of prison, Greenock teenager Liam devises a plan to raise enough money to buy a new home for himself and his mother. Dir: Ken Loach

programme.title: Clean Slate
programme.desc: Dana Carvey stars as a PI who loses his memory prior to testifying against a mob boss

programme.title: I Origins
programme.desc: Writer/director Mike Cahill's drama I Origins centers on medical student Ian Gray (Michael Pitt). Ian specializes in the evolution of the human eye. One day he attends a party where he meets a masked woman whose eyes transfix him, and soon the two fall in love. Years later, Ian makes a startling discovery in the lab, forcing him on a trek across the globe in order to uncover profound truths about mankind. I Origins screened at the 2014 Sundance Film Festival

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman (Kristen Wiig), who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Outcast Van Helsing is charged with a mission to go to the shadowy world of Transylvania and vanquish the evil Count Dracula. He joins forces with a beautiful woman descended from a powerful royal family, but finds that his goal of annihilating the enemy brings him face to face with his own past

programme.title: Deception
programme.desc: Involving, noirish thriller featuring a winning chemistry between Hugh Jackman and Ewan McGregor. Jackman plays a smooth-talking lawyer who introduces McGregor's shy corporate accountant to the wild world of a secretive sex club known as The List, whose motto is "no rough stuff and no names." Unfortunately, McGregor's involvement leads him into a maelstrom of double-crosses, intrigue and murder. Michelle Williams. Directed by Marcel Langenegger. Jackman is also one of the film's producers

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a massive earthquake devastates California

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Edward is recruited by a shadowy society at college and rises through the Cold War ranks to become a CIA spymaster. Intricate espionage thriller, only De Niro's second film as director

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a massive earthquake devastates California

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: Emotional docudrama about terminally ill New Jersey police officer Laurel Hester, whose 2005 legal battle for the right to pass her pension benefits on to her female life partner became an equal-rights milestone

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Feelgood tennis romance from the makers of Notting Hill. Low-ranking British pro Peter is inspired to greatness in his last Wimbledon tournament when he starts dating American golden girl Lizzie. But while their love match spurs him on, her game falls apart..(n)

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: Juárez. A series spotlighting the work of photojournalists in conflict zones around the world begins in Juárez, Mexico, where Eros Hoagland documents the violence and despair associated with drug trafficking, gang violence and law-enforcement agencies. Hoagland's father, Newsweek photographer John Hoagland, was killed in El Salvador in 1984(n)

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: Sharp comedy about Bobby, a mail boy in a large firm who is promised a better job by his friend, but there's one condition, only if Bobby will help him get a date with Halle Berry!(n)

programme.title: Igby Goes Down
programme.desc: This darkly funny coming-of-age story boasts an outstanding ensemble cast including Susan Sarandon, Bill Pullman, Claire Danes and Jeff Goldblum. Kieran Culkin stars as Igby, a rich teen who rebels against his dysfunctional family, including a yuppie brother (Ryan Phillippe), a tyrannical mother and a mentally ill father. Amanda Peet, Jared Harris(n)

programme.title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
programme.desc: Jack Black and Kyle Gass star as JB and KG (a.k.a. Tenacious D), two rock guitarists on a mission to become the greatest musicians in the world. All they need is a guitar pick made from Satan's tooth. On this loose premise, Liam Lynch's film, written by Black and Gass, is an excuse for the two actors to indulge in every rock joke going. The film mixes their live act, with suitably outré lyrics, with set pieces including a car chase to rival The Dukes of Hazzard and a chance to see JB doing cock push-ups. The supporting cast include Meatloaf as JB's disapproving father and, in cameos, Ben Stiller, Tim Robbins and David Grohl of Nirvana and the Foo Fighters as the devil himself(n)

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: The original cast is back for seconds in this raunchy sequel involving fun and games at a summer beach house(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Newlywed Ted wants to become a father, but must prove he's a person in a court of law first(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: When record shop owner Rob is dumped by his latest girlfriend, he compiles a list of his top five worst break-ups and attempts to reconnect with the ladies in question. Meanwhile, he and his oddball assistants contemplate the effect their love of music has had on their lives(n)

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Tony Montana, an exiled Cuban criminal goes to work for Miami drug lord Robert Loggia. Montana rises to the top of Florida's crime chain, appropriating Loggia's cocaine-addicted mistress in the process(n)

programme.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: The story of headstrong Bathsheba Everdene who attracts three different suitors; Sergeant Frank Troy, bachelor William Boldwood, and sheep farmer Gabriel Oak(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Thirteen is the new twelve in the third terrific chapter of Oscar® winners George Clooney and Steven Soderbergh's criminal caper series. With a stellar cast of criminal cohorts, it doesn't matter if it's eleven, twelve or thirteen -- it all adds up to fun. So ... are you in or are you out?(n)

programme.title: Looking: The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Focusing on the human interest story of a family man under terrifying pressures, the factually based action also vividly brings home the David and Goliath story of a battle that made US legal history

programme.title: You Don't Know Jack
programme.desc: A study of Dr. Jack Kevorkian, the enigmatic pathologist who courted controversy in the late 20th century for his advocacy of the right to die for terminally ill patients

programme.title: Making of 'Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials'
programme.desc: A look at "Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials," the 2015 sequel to "The Maze Runner" (2014) in which Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their trials after narrowly escaping the first test. The film stars Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario and Thomas Brodie-Sangster, and is directed by Wes Ball

programme.title: The Girl
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock was at the height of his fame and creativity when, in 1962, he chose an unknown fashion model to star in his most ambitious film, The Birds. But as he sculpted Tippi Hedren into the perfect Hitchcock blonde of his imagination, he became obsessed with the impossible dream of winning the real woman's love. His failure destroyed both of their careers. Screenwriter Gwyneth Hughes has interviewed Tippi Hedren and surviving members of Hitchcock's crew. This film tells their full tragic story

programme.title: We Are Marshall
programme.desc: Fact-based sports saga about the rebuilding of the football squad at West Virginia's Marshall University after a 1970 plane crash claims the lives of much of the team

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: The Democratic National Convention in Philadelphia; voter ID laws in the U.S.; and the aftermath of the recent coup in Turkey are discussed

programme.title: Ballers

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Art of War. Stone looks for clues about the crime

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Four Oscars, including Best Picture and Best Director, went to Ron Howard's engrossing drama about John Nash, the volatile Nobel Prize-winning mathematician

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: Oliver Stone's scorching drama of a young dealer seduced by money and power, who hooks up with a high-powered company trader. Michael Douglas won an Oscar for his performance as stockbroking devil Gordon Gekko

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars after an exploratory mission goes awry, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Newlywed Ted wants to become a father, but must prove he's a person in a court of law first(n)

programme.title: Amy Schumer: Live At The Apollo
Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teenage girl to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorised by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: A former warrior surrenders his soul in order to save his family in this Dracula origins story(n)

programme.title: Flash of Genius
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear stars in this inspiring fact-based story about a college professor and part-time engineer who took on corporate titans in a long legal battle with the U.S. automobile industry to receive recognition for one of his inventions. Lauren Graham, Dermot Mulroney, Alan Alda, Daniel Roebuck. Directed by Marc Abraham(n)

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Student Scarlett Johansson starts to display superhuman powers when she unwittingly comes under the influence of a new drug(n)

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: In this thrilling spy film, Will Holloway, a former MI-5 agent, is forced to partner with Harry Pearce, the man decommissioned him, to apprehend a terrorist who escaped during routine prisoner transport and prevent an attack on the city of London. Based on a British televison series "Spooks."(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to recreate a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park(n)

programme.title: Bait Shop
programme.desc: A small-town bait-shop owner competes in a fishing contest against a showboating pro in order to win the cash he needs to save his floundering business(n)

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: In 1970s New York, a drug kingpin has built a vast and powerful empire thanks to his unique high-quality heroin supply lines from the Far East and his mafia connections. However, on the other side of the law, a dedicated detective is charged with heading up a narcotics task force to crack down on drug dealers and break heroin's hold on Harlem(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy cum thriller in which a man killed by a mugger returns as his young girlfriend's ghostly guardian. Realising, in his spirit state, that his murder was premeditated and that her life is in great danger, he tries to make contact through a fake spiritualist. But will his girlfriend take the woman seriously?(n)

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Student Scarlett Johansson starts to display superhuman powers when she unwittingly comes under the influence of a new drug(n)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: In this provocative thriller, a lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her(n)

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Sylvester Stallone as an explosives expert who becomes involved in one woman's obsessive desire for vengeance. Ray Quick is hired by May Munro (Sharon Stone) to kill the people who murdered her parents when she was a child. However, Ray soon discovers that May is not quite all that she seems and that a shadow from his own past has returned to haunt him

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: In Hollywood, Sidney Prescott must once again confront her demons when the stars of a horror movie sequel based on her life begin to die

programme.title: MacArthur
programme.desc: Courage and daring earned him a general's stripes. But it was Douglas MacArthur's promise "I shall return" which made him a hero, when he returned to the Philippines to fight the Japanese in WWII

programme.title: Being There
programme.desc: Peter Sellers plays Chance, a simple-minded gardener who has to cope with the outside world once his employer passes on in Hal Ashby's bittersweet film. Melvyn Douglas won an oscar for best supporting actor for his role as Benjamin Turnbull Rand

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and Kevin Hart headline this Warner Bros. comedy about a wrongfully convicted investment banker who prepares for prison life with the help of the man who washes his car. Etan Cohen directs, with Ian Roberts and Jay Martel handling screenwriting duties

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry Shaw and Rachel Holloman were complete strangers at the beginning of the day, but that changed the instant a strange woman called to threaten both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. Suddenly forced into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, Jerry and Rachel must now take orders from a woman who's using everyday technology to track and control their every move

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin finds himself on the run after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia in this stylised adaptation of the popular video game

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: A radical group has seized control of a nuclear missile base and the USS Alabama, a state-of-the-art nuclear submarine, has been ordered into action in this taut thriller. But when a fragmented message arrives onboard to launch a defensive strike against the enemy, suddenly a fiery battle of wills erupts between the veteran sub commander - who never questions orders - and his more cautious second officer, who can't help but suspect a command to start a nuclear war. Gene Hackman and Denzel Washington star

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: Will Ferrell and Kevin Hart headline this Warner Bros. comedy about a wrongfully convicted investment banker who prepares for prison life with the help of the man who washes his car. Etan Cohen directs, with Ian Roberts and Jay Martel handling screenwriting duties

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: In this sweeping epic set in the Australian outback, a father gifted with the power to find water flowing underground fulfills a promise to his wife to locate their sons lost at the battle of Gallipoli

programme.title: Consenting Adults
programme.desc: A man is arrested on suspicion of murder after succumbing to his neighbour's desire for a wife-swapping session. A suburban couple's lifestyle is enlivened with the arrival of new neighbours, and before long the husband is talked into a wife-swapping deal. But the next morning his 'new partner' is found bludgeoned to death - and he finds himself arrested on a murder charge

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: In this exciting thriller, two rebellious boys steal a police cruiser and go for a joyride. But when they find a dead body in the trunk, they realize they must evade the car's owner, a corrupt small-town sheriff who's desperate to reclaim his property(n)

programme.title: House
programme.desc: In this chilling and suspenseful psychological thriller, two couples seek refuge from a madman in what they think is a deserted house in the woods, but they're right where he wants them. Allana Bale, J.P. Davis, Heidi Dippold(n)

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: Soon after pilot Tuck Pendleton and his craft are miniaturised in a scientific experiment, thieves try to steal the technology used, so a scientist injects Tuck into the nearest available body - which turns out to be that of hypochondriac Jack Putter. Now Tuck and Jack must work together to foil the criminals and extract Tuck before his oxygen runs out(n)

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: Michael Caton-Jones rites-of-passage film stars teenage Leonardo DiCaprio and Ellen Barkin as his mother who flee dad and elder brother back East and end up in Washington where she falls under the spell of old-fashioned lover Robert De Niro, little realising his hidden penchant for tyranny(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Crashing on an unknown planet in the year 2029, astronaut Leo Davidson is caught up in a savage society where apes keep human slaves(n)

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: Strong performances and a taut script drive this pulse-pounding thriller about a forensic psychologist (Morgan Freeman) tracking an elusive serial killer. Helping him is a medical intern (Ashley Judd)---the only abductee to escape the killer's dungeon. Cary Elwes, Tony Goldwyn, Jay O. Sanders, Bill Nunn(n)

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: In this chilling sequel, two young brothers (Dartanian Sloan and Robert Daniel Sloan) must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies(n)

programme.title: Point of No Return
programme.desc: Bridget Fonda is the junkie given a choice by shady agent Gabriel Byrne: kill for the government or stay on Death Row. Blazing, profane remake of action gem Nikita(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body(n)

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Queen Witch who has returned from the dead in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance(n)

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: After their plane crashes in the Amazon, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rainforest are captured by a tribe of cannibals(n)

programme.desc: A former cop risks his life to save a young woman who Satan, disguised as an investment banker, has targeted as the eminent mother of his spawn(n)

programme.title: Hard to Kill
programme.desc: Action drama about an LA cop intent on exacting revenge on the corrupt colleagues who shot his family and put him in a coma

programme.title: Peacock
programme.desc: A Nebraska bank clerk finds his tenuous grip on reality slipping after a freak train accident reveals his deepest secret to the entire community. John Skillpa (Cillian Murphy) is a reserved bank teller living in the tight-knit community of Peacock. He may live by himself, but he's never alone; John has two personalities. His alter ego is Emma, but Emma has always been a well-kept secret -- until now. When a passing caboose jumps the rails and comes slamming through John's backyard, the neighbors all race to his aid and are surprised to find Emma wandering about dazed and confused. Instinctively assuming Emma to be John's wife, they rally around the Skillpas in support. But the harder they try to get closer to Emma, the deeper John slips into psychosis. The key to his mystery-shrouded past resting in the hands of young, overburdened mother Maggie (Ellen Page), John finds his two personalities clashing as his fragile deception becomes ever more difficult to maintain. Susan Sarandon, Keith Carradine, Bill Pullman, and Josh Lucas co-star

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: A Nigerian couple in the U.S. clash over a traditional circumcision for their 10-year-old daughter. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2015 American Black Film Festival

programme.title: Black Card
programme.desc: A missing identification card forces a couple to take a closer look at their culture, identity and place in society. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2015 American Black Film Festival

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: Two unscrupulous gym employees (Frances McDormand and Brad Pitt) find a disk containing the memoirs of CIA agent Osbourne Cox (John Malkovich) and try to turn it into cash. At the same time, Harry Pfarrer (George Clooney), a paranoid married State Department marshal who is having an affair with Osbourne's wife becomes inadvertently involved in the case

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimpanzees to horrifying results in this speculative sci-fi horror effort from Trainspotting director Danny Boyle. Waking from a coma in a deserted London hospital 28 days later, bicycle courier Jim (Cillian Murphy) takes to the deserted city streets in a state of mystified confusion. Joining forces with another group of survivors following a terrifying encounter in a seemingly abandoned church, Jim soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows. It's soon revealed that the chimpanzees had been harboring a deadly virus that sends its victims into a furious, murderous rage, and in the days following the initial exposure, the entire population was nearly wiped out due to the resulting homicidal rampage. Is there still a glimmer of hope for humanity -- or has the deadly "rage" virus found its way to foreign shores and infected the entire planet?

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: After moving to an old farmhouse with their mother, two young brothers must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: In this powerful adaptation of the best-selling novel, a husband becomes a suspect in his wife's disappearance after she vanishes on their fifth wedding anniversary

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: When Ted Crawford discovers his young wife is having an affair, he coolly and cruelly shoots her. The clever engineer thinks he knows how to walk away an innocent man, but hotshot prosecution lawyer Willy Beachum will stop at nothing to get his man

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: In Hollywood, Sidney Prescott must once again confront her demons when the stars of a horror movie sequel based on her life begin to die

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: A tarnished New York cop and his younger partner run afoul of the Japanese Yakuza after escorting a crime boss to Osaka in order to stand trial

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: In this fast-paced caper, a con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: The final chapter in the epic tale of Bilbo Baggins sees the hobbit and company caught up in a war that threatens to destroy all of Middle Earth

programme.title: The Children
programme.desc: After a nuclear power plant leaks poison gas, the children on a school bus are transformed into zombies(n)

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: Casey Ryback is a former Navy SEAL captain who is now the cook aboard the USS Missouri. Everyone aboard is about to celebrate the birthday of Captain Adams. They've even hired a band led by William Strannix, and former playboy playmate Jordan Tate to jump out of a cake and dance. What Adams doesn't know is that he is in for a deadly surprise(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: . In the waning days of World War II, General Douglas MacArthur chose to make good on a pledge that he made in 1942 -- that he would return to the Philippines after he and his troops were forced to retreat. However, MacArthur's determination was more than a matter of pride. Over 500 American soldiers were being held in Cabanatuan, a notoriously brutal prisoner of war camp in the Philippines operated by the Japanese army, and MacArthur wanted to see to it that they made it home(n)

programme.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
programme.desc: Diabolical vigilante Red Hood sets out to clean up the streets of Gotham City and destroy Batman. Meanwhile, as Red Hood brutally exterminates the scum of the city, the Joker reappears to taunt Batman in his darkest hour(n)

programme.title: The Quest
programme.desc: Tale set in the 1920s about a New York pickpocket on the run from the police who finds action and adventure around the globe. His flight from the law involves him in various daring escapades and tricky situations, including capture by South Sea pirates. He finally ends up in Tibet, where he enters a prestigious martial arts competition(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Evan Baxter is a rising congressman with a bright future and his goal to change the world. God hears this message and decides to give him a hand. Delivering Evan the material and the animals, he sets Evan the task of building an ark. After trying to ignore God as much as possible, Evan eventually goes ahead with the plan, even if the other Congressmen and his family thinks he's mad(n)

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Liam Neeson reunites with Unknown director Jaume Collet-Serra for this Warner Bros. thriller following a mob hit man and his estranged son (Joel Kinnaman) as they flee the wrath of a vengeful crime boss(n)

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A shiftless bank robber looking to provide for his family crosses paths with an ambitious cop during a heist, changing both of their lives forever(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone(n)

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Hit action film with Sylvester Stallone, a bomb expert, and Sharon Stone who asks him to avenge her family's murder(n)

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: Spoof of '80s slasher films about a killer who targets a teenager whose mother was brutally murdered the year before(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: Three flawed individuals search for a violent justice on the rain-soaked, crime-ridden streets of Basin City(n)

programme.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
programme.desc: Hysterical mockumentary following the misadventures of Borat, a Kazakh journalist, as he interacts with real people on a road trip across America as he seeks to marry Pamela Anderson

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Moving Oscar-winning drama about an Italian Jew who tries to shield his son from the horrors of their Nazi prison camp. In Italian with English subtitles

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral
programme.desc: After their mother passes away, four estranged siblings return home to attend the traditional funeral she wanted

programme.title: Cry Freedom
programme.desc: South African journalist Donald Woods is forced to flee the country after attempting to investigate the death in custody of his friend the black activist Steve Biko

programme.title: Less than Zero
programme.desc: Based on the great debut novel by Bret Easton Ellis; Rich kids Andrew McCarthy, Jamie Gertz and Robert Downey Jnr. deal with the drug scene in 1980s La

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: The follow-up to the employee-revenge comedy finds Dale, Kurt and Nick endeavour to become their own bosses with a new entrepreneurial venture. When a slick investor steals their idea, the boys turn back to crime to seek some justice

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Prepare to be blown away when retired hit man John Wick returns to the fray to punish the NYC gangsters who destroyed his life

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: Thriller/sci-fi/action adventure set in a dystopian future in which worldwide infertility has led to chaos. However, a British bureaucrat-turned-reluctant activist finds hope when he becomes the protector of the world's only pregnant woman

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: Action maestro Ridley Scott ("Alien"; "Gladiator") shifts gears for this witty and intelligent caper about a con artist (Nicolas Cage) whose peculiar psychological problems are compounded when he meets the daughter (Alison Lohman) he never knew he had. Sam Rockwell, Bruce Altman, Bruce McGill, Sheila Kelly, Jenny O'Hara, Steve Eastin

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Jack Lemmon and Walter Matthau are reunited in this joyfully grumpy comedy, playing two neighbours who renew their animosity when an attractive widow moves in across the street

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Action-packed sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: Pop icon Marc Anthony steps into the role of Salsa superstar Hector Lavoe in this biopic that follows the singer from his early career success as a Puerto Rican teen sensation to his later status as a New York City Latin idol while also documenting his ongoing struggle against drug and alcohol addiction. Actress and pop star Jennifer Lopez co-stars as Puchi; Lavoe's longtime muse and love interest

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A shiftless bank robber looking to provide for his family crosses paths with an ambitious cop during a heist, changing both of their lives forever(n)

programme.title: The Long, Hot Summer
programme.desc: Ben is the drifter (and suspected barn- burner) who arrives in a small Mississippi town and is welcomed by tyrannical rancher Will as a suitor for his daughter. Drama(n)

programme.title: The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: The Poseidon is an ocean liner charting its course on New Year's Eve. Just after midnight, Captain Harrison (Leslie Nielsen) spots the mother of all tidal waves. It is the last thing that Harrison and practically everyone else onboard sees before drowning -- the Poseidon is turned upside down, with only a handful of survivors. The ten lucky ones -- including Mike Rogo (Ernest Borgnine), Linda Rogo (Stella Stevens), Acres (Roddy McDowall), Belle Rosen (Shelley Winters), and Manny Rosen (Jack Albertson) -- led by no-nonsense minister Frank Scott (Gene Hackman), desperately attempt to climb from the top of the ship (now submerged) to the bottom (now "the top"). The film's theme song, "The Morning After," sung by Maureen McGovern, earned an Oscar. In addition, The Poseidon Adventure received the Special Achievement Award for Special Effects; L.B. Abbott and A.D. Flowers were the recipients. A sequel, Beyond the Poseidon Adventure, came out in 1979(n)

programme.title: License to Drive
programme.desc: A teen (Corey Haim) who flunked his driver's test sneaks his grandfather's Caddy out for a joy ride. Dean: Corey Feldman. Mom: Carol Kane. Dad: Richard Masur. Mercedes: Heather Graham. Directed by Greg Beeman(n)

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: A newlywed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon(n)

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the U.S. in the 1980s(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote farm in Pennsylvania(n)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: A rich young woman marries a poor radio announcer and finds their relationship tested on a disaster-filled European honeymoon. The couple's chemistry and the characters' outrageous antics make the film(n)

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: In this poignant romantic drama, a star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an aging man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration(n)

programme.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: After faking insanity, a prisoner is consigned to a mental institution where he clashes with a vindictive nurse, but manages to inspire some of his fellow inmates(n)

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Three vampires try to blend into modern society while still feeding their fiendish urges(n)

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: The last in the trilogy is set in Hollywood, where Stab 3 is being shot and where Courtney Cox Arquette and David Arquette are on set as advisors to Parker Posey - unfortunately, there's a killer who decides to off the cast in the order of the screenplay and only Neve Campbell, now in hiding until the killer tracks her down, can solve the riddle(n)

programme.title: From Here to Eternity
programme.desc: The compelling tale of US soldiers stationed on Hawaii in the build-up to the attack on Pearl Harbor. Look out for that famous beach kiss! Dir: Fred Zinnemann

programme.title: Raintree County
programme.desc: An epic 'Gone With The Wind'-style civil war drama, with Elizabeth Taylor as a spoiled Southern belle seducing Montgomery Clift away from his true love (Eva Marie Saint)

programme.title: Riffraff
programme.desc: A pretty young cannery worker and her fisherman husband find themselves embroiled in a high stakes adventure when they both run afoul of the law

programme.title: Saratoga
programme.desc: Jean Harlow is the devoted farmer's daughter for whom the lure of the race track (and smooth gambler Clark Gable) proves just too irresistible. This proved to be Harlow's last film: she collapsed before shooting was completed and died soon afterwards

programme.title: The Beast of the City
programme.desc: A reluctantly appointed police chief in a crime-riddled city decides to try and make a difference, working ruthlessly hard to clean the streets of gangsters and to shape up his own corrupt department

programme.title: Personal Property
programme.desc: A sheriff poses as a butler to watch over the attached furniture of his brother's fiancee

programme.title: China Seas
programme.desc: Dynamic Alan Gaskell captains a ship bound from Hong Kong to Singapore. Gaskell tries to turn over a new leaf from his hard-drinking lifestyle after becoming attached to a refined high class English lady, Sybil Barclay. His former girlfriend Dolly is extremely jealous of the budding relationship and tries hard to get the Captain back. He is apparently unimpressed with her loud, obnoxious, and uncivilized manners, even though she is extremely beautiful

programme.title: Harlow: The Blonde Bombshell
programme.desc: A look at the career of one of Hollywood's legendary sex symbols. Included: her brief marriages to Paul Bern and Harold Rosson; and her films, including "Red-Headed Woman" (1932), "Beast of the City" (1932) and "Reckless" (1935)

programme.title: Dinner at Eight
programme.desc: Marie Dressler, Jean Harlow and John & Lionel Barrymore head the star-studded cast of director George Cukor's delicious comedy of manners, tracing the Machiavellian efforts of a Park Avenue snob to secure an English aristocrat as a dinner guest

programme.title: Libeled Lady
programme.desc: In this film, William Powell and Myrna Loy star as Bill Chandler and Connie Allenbury. She's an heiress, while he's a former newspaper man. Bill is enlisted by his ex-boss to get the goods on Connie, who turns around and sues the paper for libel

programme.title: Red Dust
programme.desc: Celebrated steamy romance, with Clark Gable's plantation owner falling for Jean Harlow's floozie, then dumping her for a married woman with tragic results

programme.title: Bombshell
programme.desc: Jean Harlow stars in this biograpical comedy as Lola Burns, the most beautiful, famous and glamorous actress in Hollywood who rebels against anything she can

programme.title: Wife vs. Secretary
programme.desc: Romantic drama, with Clark Gable as a devoted husband whose relationship with his secretary is misinterpreted by his wife

programme.title: Reckless
programme.desc: A romantic triangle develops among a showgirl, a producer and a playboy heir(n)

programme.title: Red Headed Woman
programme.desc: A beautiful and determined young secretary schemes mightily to get her employer to request her hand in marriage and ultimately can't help but succeed. Many classic Jean Harlow moments abound in this fun, slightly racy pre-code romp(n)

programme.title: Suzy
programme.desc: Dorothy Parker had a hand in the script of this romantic spy drama, which features the only screen pairing of stars Jean Harlow and Cary Grant, here playing a chorus girl and philandering aviator who fall in love(n)

programme.title: The Hoodlum Saint
programme.desc: William Powell plays a cynical con man who graduates from penny-ante operations to a big-time charity racket. The scam involves collecting money on behalf of St. Dismas, bringing Powell in close contact with several men of the cloth. As the racket rolls on, Powell is touched by the sincerity of the religious men and the plights of the charity's rightful recipients. He has a change of heart, confessing his original criminal intentions but seeing to it that the money goes to the right people. Hoodlum Saint was typical of the facile religiosity often found in MGM pictures of the period. The film is best remembered as the first non-aquatic performance of MGM swimming star Esther Williams(n)

programme.title: Fiesta
programme.desc: Romance, bullfighting, piano music and dancing south of the border(n)

programme.title: Texas Carnival
programme.desc: Great musical stars (including Esther Williams, Howard Keel, Red Skelton and Ann Miller) get together for this breezy, romantic musical adventure(n)

programme.title: Pagan Love Song
programme.desc: A Tahitian beauty romances a visiting teacher who has inherited a nearby plantation(n)

programme.title: Easy to Love
programme.desc: The star of a water show (Esther Williams) is secretly in love with her boss (Van Johnson), so she tries to make him jealous by coquettishly coming on to both a swimming instructor (John Bromfield) and a singer (Tony Martin). Busby Berkeley staged the musical numbers(n)

programme.title: On an Island with You
programme.desc: A beautiful movie star shooting her latest film at a plush Hawaiian resort becomes the object of a very persistent naval officer's affections(n)

programme.title: Dangerous When Wet
programme.desc: A young woman enters a contest to be the first to swim the English Channel(n)

programme.title: Skirts Ahoy!
programme.desc: Esther Williams generously shares screen time with Joan Evans and Vivian Blaine in Skirts Ahoy! The three leading ladies play WAVE officers who experience a daunting series of romantic misadventures. Whitney Young (Williams) had joined the WAVES after leaving her fiancé at the altar. Conversely Mary Kate Yarbrough (Evans) was jilted on her wedding day by her intended, while Una Yancy (Blaine) has donned a uniform in hopes of finding a husband. Much of the humor is of the gender-switch variety, with the three lady sailors ogling and whistling at every eligible male who crosses their path. Inevitably, Williams sheds her navy duds in favor of a swimsuit, while Blaine performs a comic torch song in the manner of her "Miss Adelaide" characterization in Guys and Dolls. Poor Joan Evans isn't given a musical number, but she does get her man (Keefe Brasselle) at the end. Guest performers include the singing DeMarco Sisters and youthful aquatic champs Russell and Kathy Tongay(n)

programme.title: Bathing Beauty
programme.desc: Songwriter Steve Elliot is about to marry Caroline Brooks when a strange woman who's been paid by Steve's agent to say she's Steve's wife, interrups the cermony(n)

programme.title: Million Dollar Mermaid
programme.desc: Based on the life of swimming sensation Annette Kellerman, who conquered Broadway in a series of aquatic extravaganzas(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: A 23rd-century New York City cabbie encounters a genetically engineered alien named Leeloo, who has the life force that can unite the planet's elements and stave off a raging fireball that's on a collision course with Earth

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow (Rebecca Hall) of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist (Jason Sudeikis) who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing. Directed by Sean Mewshaw

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military-defense contractor is rehired by his former boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. He reconnects with an old flame while there, but finds himself increasingly drawn to an Air Force pilot assigned to watch over him

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Accomplished mall security guard Paul Blart discovers a heist plot while attending an expo in Las Vegas. His investigative prowess is needed to foil the robbery and arrest those responsible

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: A cop investigates a murder witnessed by the son of an Amish widow in Peter Weir's study of culture clash

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow (Rebecca Hall) of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist (Jason Sudeikis) who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing. Directed by Sean Mewshaw

programme.title: Kramer vs. Kramer
programme.desc: Ted Kramer is on the brink of a career advance when his wife leaves him. Balancing his ambition with caring for his little son Billy isn't easy, but Ted copes... until Joanna shows up again, and this time, she wants Billy back

Thriller, based on a true story. A brilliant young mathematician is recruited by his professor (Kevin Spacey) to join a crack team of students whose system of card-counting is enabling them to win millions from the casinos of Las Vegas. How long can their winning streak last, however, once a suspicious head of casino security (Laurence Fishburne) makes it his mission to bring an end to their forbidden activities?

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow (Rebecca Hall) of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist (Jason Sudeikis) who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing. Directed by Sean Mewshaw

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three best friends reunite every Christmas Eve for a wild night of debauchery in New York City in this hilarious holiday treat. Since they're getting older and have new responsibilities, they plan one last epic bash together, which includes finding their way into a legendary party called the Nutcracka Ball

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Worry, Baby. A club expansion spreads Ghost thin, between Angela, the children, the business and Tommy. Meanwhile, Tommy faces a tough decision; Kanan returns to the life; and Angela has some doubts(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Age of Umbrage. When Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, the result is a scandal that envelops the whole family(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realises that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: Retired tough guy Denzel Washington returns to his old ways to protect a girl from Russian gangsters(n)

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: A writer is trying to fly from New York to Savannah, Georgia, where he is due to be married in two days' time. But the plane crashes during take-off and the writer inadvertently saves the life of one of his fellow passengers, a free-spirited woman. She then accompanies him as he tries to continue his journey by rental car, train and bus - but he is beset by one disaster after another(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: When a scientifically minded teenager (Britt Robertson) discovers a technologically advanced trinket that provides an astounding glimpse of the future, she enlists the help of a reclusive inventor (George Clooney) to make "Tomorrowland" a reality today(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc.
programme.desc: In the city of Monstropolis, hulking, blue-furred behemoth James P. Sulley Sullivan and his one-eyed wisecracking best friend Mike Wazowski are employed by Monsters, Inc., a scream processing factory that thrives on the screams of kids spooked by monsters lurking under their beds and in their closets. It's the job of Sulley, Mike, and their co-workers to keep the frights flowing. But, when Sulley and Mike are followed back into the monster world by a very unafraid little human girl named Boo, it's up to them to send her back in her door before anybody finds out. With the aggravating fact that monsters are actually terrified of children'(n)

programme.title: Roll Bounce
programme.desc: Xavier Smith , known to his friends as X, is a teenager growing up on the South Side of Chicago in the late '70s. X and his buddies are the hotshot skaters at the Palisades Gardens, a neighbourhood roller rink where local kids roll to the latest disco sounds, but X loses his status as king of the hill when the Palisades closes down(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: More than a decade since a painful Prom Night accident scuppered his chances with the hottest girl in school, a perennial loser decides to track her down and win her over. Comedy

programme.title: Showgirls
programme.desc: Paul Verhoeven's glitzy, goodtime yet controversial film stars Elizabeth Berkley as Nomi Malone, the new girl at the Stardust Club, where the speciality is lap dancing. Taken under the wing and into the bed of veteran Cristal Connors (Gina Gershon), she learns the tricks of the trade, from how to make the big money to unusual uses for ice cubes

programme.title: EDtv
programme.desc: A San Francisco video-store clerk becomes an overnight star when he agrees to let his life be filmed around-the clock for a reality show. However, the media exposure takes a toll on his friends and family

programme.title: Ricki and the Flash
programme.desc: Ricki is an aging rock-n'roll-loving woman who abandoned her family in order to chase her tattered dream of becoming a famous rock star. Now, she is given one last chance to set things right when her ex-husband, Pete, asks her to visit her estranged daughter, Julie, in Chicago

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Peter La Fleur owns Average Joe's Gym, a scruffy establishment with a loyal clientele, while across the street Globo Gym, owned by White Goodman, is all glass and chrome and full of toned muscle. When Peter learns that he must pay the bank $50,000 in 30 days, White is overjoyed: now he can have the parking lot his gym's always needed. But Peter decides to set up a money-earning dodgeball tournament (a sport that consists of not being hit by the opposing team's balls) to earn the dough and it is, of course, his team of misfits against White's tough pros in the final. Rawson Marshall Thurber's debut feature is a mix of verbal and physical humour and if the outcome is never in doubt, both Vaughn and particularly Stiller throw themselves into the film with enjoyable gusto

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: Kevin Caffery is a professional thief with taste and style who gets a tip for an easy heist: Billionaire tycoon Max Fairbanks' unoccupied beachfront mansion. But as Kevin is tossing Faberge eggs into his professional pillowcase, he finds himself face to face with the billionaire. Just before the cops drag Kevin away, Max spies Kevin's good-luck ring and decides to claim it as his own Only one problem...the ring was given to Kevin by his new love, and he is determined to get it back. How far will these two men go? As far as they have to. Even if it means divorce, public scandal, financial ruin, and prison. This battle of capitalist vs. robber escalates into a colossal tournament of egos threatening to take both men and everyone around them down

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: More than a decade since a painful Prom Night accident scuppered his chances with the hottest girl in school, a perennial loser decides to track her down and win her over. Comedy

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: Mike Judge (Beavis and Butt-head, King of the Hill) takes an edgy look at the workplace with this comedy about a computer programmer (Ron Livingston) who rebels against his employer with surprising results. Jennifer Aniston, Gary Cole, Stephen Root

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: Cosmic outlaws face an interstellar villain who seeks to control the universe with a powerful orb in the most-outrageous space adventure ever to hit the big screen. Together, Peter Quill, Rocket Raccoon, Groot, Gamora and Drax the Destroyer may be the galaxy's only hope for thwarting Ronan's sinister plan

programme.title: Still Alice
programme.desc: Linguistics professor Alice Howland finds her relationship with her husband and three children tested when she is diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer's disease(n)

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: Goblins, elves and other mystical creatures attempt to take control of a powerful potion in this animated tale loosely adapted from Shakespeare's "A Midsummer Night's Dream."(n)

programme.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a family find themselves having the worst day ever! Family comedy starring Steve Carell and Jennifer Garner(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: The fate of the universe falls into the hands of cocky adventurer Chris Pratt and his ragtag team of unlikely heroes in Marvel's hit adventure. Violence/flashing images. (2014)(116 mins)(n)

programme.title: Courage Under Fire
programme.desc: "Rashomon"-like flashbacks lend depth to this military drama, which centers on a scrupulous Army officer probing the Gulf War death of a chopper pilot(n)

programme.title: Regarding Henry
programme.desc: Combining elements of A Christmas Carol and Rain Man (1988), this modern-day parable of greed and redemption was crafted with generous helpings of sentimentality by director Mike Nicholas. Harrison Ford stars as Henry Turner, a slick, ruthless corporate attorney willing to spin any falsehood to win a case. A bully to his teenage daughter Rachel (Mikki Allen), Henry also cheats on his wife Sarah (Annette Bening) and treats everyone from the maid to his assistant with cruel selfishness. Stepping out to a local mini-market for a pack of cigarettes late one night, Henry accidentally interrupts a burglary and is shot in the head by a stick-up artist. After a long coma, Henry survives only to find that he has no memory and must re-learn everything from reading to tying his shoes. Reborn as a friendly, childlike innocent, Henry charms his therapist (Bill Nunn) and reconnects with his wife and daughter, only to uncover some secrets about how truly appalling he once was(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: While treasure hunting in the Bahamas, a group of young divers discover a wrecked cargo plane on the ocean's floor. Within lies millions of dollars of illegal drugs, and the divers' dream of finding sunken treasure has come true. But as they argue among themselves about what to do with their prize, the friends soon realize they're not the only ones interested in the narcotics. Dangerous criminals are also searching for the drugs, and now the treasure hunters themselves have become the hunted(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in the incredible true story of a rebel German army officer who led a plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler and overthrow his ruthless Nazi regime during World War II. Bryan Singer ("X-Men") directs this suspenseful thriller. Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy, Tom Wilkinson(n)

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African American, then also the first amputee, US Navy Diver and the man who trained him(n)

programme.desc: "Rashomon"-like flashbacks lend depth to this military drama, which centers on a scrupulous Army officer probing the Gulf War death of a chopper pilot(n)

programme.title: Blue Velvet
programme.desc: This film depicts the strange happenings in a small North Carolina town

programme.title: Silent House

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Four businessmen head to the wilds of America for a canoe trip, where they fall prey to a clan of violent hillbillies. Classic thriller with Jon Voight and Burt Reynolds. (1972)(105 mins)

programme.title: City of God
programme.desc: In the Films to See Before You Die strand, Paul Kaye introduces Fernando Meirelles' award-winning film which centres on the poor of Rio de Janeiro and the armed gangs who run riot, seen through the eyes and camera of Rocket. Rocket escapes the influence of Li'l Zé, who goes on to become the area's godfather. Over two decades, Rocket witnesses the rise of his peers from children to men and the escalation of the violence as he, distanced but emotionally involved, charts their lives. Based on Paul Lins' fact-based novel, this is a stunning, violent yet compelling insight into Brazil's underbelly

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Obsession, jealousy, and deceit define the tense relationship shared between two turn-of-the-century magicians in Memento and Batman Begins director Christopher Nolan's dizzying tale of sleight of hand. Rupert Angier (Hugh Jackman) and Alfred Borden (Christian Bale) are London-based magicians of the highest order, both blessed with spectacular powers of deception and both cursed with unrelenting envy for one another's skills. When Alfred performs an awe-inspiring trick for which there seems no logical explanation, the friendly competition shared between the pair turns to deadly rivalry as the enraged Rupert determines to uncover his rival's deepest secrets. In the world of illusion, however, nothing is ever quite as it seems, and the rules of the physical world simply don't apply. Now, as bitter competition quickly begins to consume the souls of both performers, the firestorm birthed by their anger threatens to consume all who surround them. Michael Caine, Scarlett Johansson, and David Bowie co-star in a feature that finds director/screenwriter Nolan reuniting with brother and Memento story author Jonathan Nolan to adapt author Christopher Priest's original novel

programme.title: Millions
programme.desc: Director Danny Boyle revisits a theme from his Shallow Grave and Trainspotting days -- greed -- but focuses on a much younger protagonist with this comedy drama. Millions opens with recent widower Ronnie (James Nesbitt) moving his two precocious pre-pubescent sons to the suburbs. Missing his mother and the comforts of his old neighborhood, the young Damian (Alex Etel) builds a cardboard-box fort on the outskirts of the suburb, where one day his placid introvert existence is literally crushed by a giant gym bag full of thousands of pounds' worth of cash. Less concerned with the origin of the money than with how to spend it, Damian and his older brother, Anthony (Lewis McGibbon), decide to keep it a secret from their father, which becomes an increasingly tricky proposition as the days pass. His conscience getting in the way of his spending, Damian debates the ethics of his ill-gotten gains with a handful of imaginary saints, and begins to try to spend his cash a little more altruistically. But his charitable deeds inadvertently attract the attention of a mysterious, threatening man who's desperate to get his hands on the money. Marking a distinct change of pace for Boyle after the horror film 28 Days Later, Millions world-premiered at the 2004 Toronto Film Festival

programme.title: Melinda and Melinda
programme.desc: Two playwrights settle an argument about whether life is essentially funny or sad by each telling a story with the same beginning: a young woman called Melinda crashes a dinner party

programme.title: Goats
programme.desc: A pot-smoking teen raised by his New Age mother and a marijuana-growing goat herder enrolls in the same East Coast prep school his absentee father once attended, and finds it difficult to adjust to his new environment in this winning comedy

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: An idealistic German prosecutor becomes interested in the case of a schoolteacher who once worked at Auschwitz. In time, the prosecutor attempts to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: Kevin Costner is the Civil war veteran facing a nation of Sioux warriors in an epic western which swept the award boards, winning seven Oscars

programme.title: Magic in the Moonlight
programme.desc: Set in the 1920s French Riviera, this delightfully quirky romantic comedy follows a surprising series of events that occur when a master magician tries to expose a psychic as a fraud

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Gripping conspiracy thriller. After an assassination attempt on the American President (William Hurt) during a meeting of world leaders in Salamanca, a secret service agent attempts to piece together who was responsible. The event is replayed through the eyes of six different witnesses, each time from their individual perspective. Each time a little more is revealed about what really happened, with a new twist just when you think you have it all figured out(n)

programme.title: Woman on Top
programme.desc: Penelope Cruz stars in this spicy romantic-comedy as a Brazilian bombshell chef who melts the hearts of men everywhere. But when she catches her husband cheating, she moves to San Francisco and discovers happiness as the star of her own TV cooking show. Murilo Benicio, Harold Perrineau Jr(n)

programme.title: The History Boys
programme.desc: Film adaptation of Alan Bennett's acclaimed stage play set in the north of England in the 1980s. Eight school pupils studying history pursue an undergraduate place at Oxford or Cambridge. Their headmaster is determined to see them break records and enlists a new teacher to coach the boys into intellectual shape. Seduced though they are by his promises, the boys are concerned that there is more to learning than exams and grades, and become caught in a clash of education styles and loyalties.Dir: Nicholas Hytner(n)

programme.desc: A college dropout gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it sounds

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A mismatched group of bored suburbanites longing to escape the stress of their daily lives and embrace the freedom of the open road finds that it takes more than polished chrome and leather jackets to truly experience the biker lifestyle in this revved-up road comedy starring John Travolta, Tim Allen, Martin Lawrence, and William H. Macy. Upon trading the comfort of their couches for the thunderous rumble of two-wheeled street machines, these four adventurous riders cross paths with the notorious Del Fuegos -- an authentic biker gang that doesn't take kindly to the weekend warrior type

programme.title: To Sir, With Love II
programme.desc: Made-for-TV sequel to the classic drama about an American teacher assigned to a rough London school. Returning to Chicago from Britain following his retirement, the inspirational instructor discovers that there is a deprived school near his new home that is crying out for a new teacher

programme.title: Nelson Mandela Redrawn
programme.desc: A profile of South African statesman Nelson Mandela (1918-2013) includes comments by Bono, Bill Cosby, Richard Branson and David Dinkins

programme.title: The Cave
programme.desc: Terror lurks deep beneath the surface of the Earth in this thriller. While on a dig in a Romanian forest, a group of scientists make a startling find -- they find a huge abbey, dating back to the 13th Century, which was built over the entrance to a massive network of subterranean caves. Eager to learn what lurks within the caves, the scientists discover to their peril that a large part of the cave system is under water. Undeterred, the remaining scientists hire a team of American spelunkers who are trained in exploring underwater caves, led by brothers Jack (Cole Hauser) and Tyler (Eddie Cibrian). Armed with new high-tech SCUBA gear that allows them to stay under water for a full 24 hours, Jack, Tyler, and the rest of their crew dive in to investigate the caves, but a mishap traps them in a cavern beneath the surface, and they soon discover they are not alone, as strange and bloodthirsty creatures make their presence known. The Cave also stars Morris Chestnut, Rick Ravanello, Piper Perabo, and Lena Headey

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: Danny Glover leads a black cavalry troop in pursuit of an Apache warrior---and endures continual degradation from white officers. Mykelti Williamson, Glynn Turman. Horse: Carl Lumbly. Tockes: Michael Warren. Grierson: Bob Gunton. Charles Haid directed

programme.title: About Alex
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings who were college friends come together for a long weekend after one of them suffers a breakdown and attempts suicide, but their reunion takes a dark turn as old resentments and relationship issues bubble to the surface during the drug-and-booze-filled getaway

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A man hoping to make his way back to the big time starts by heading back to middle school in this comedy. Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is one of the most successful coaches in college basketball, but he's just as famous for his hair-trigger temper as he is for molding winning teams. When an outburst of anger during a game escalates into an embarrassing public indecent, McCormick loses his job and is banned from college sports. Looking for a way to rehabilitate his image, McCormick takes a job coaching the basketball team at the middle school he used to attend, only to discover his players are a handful of misfits and losers with no skill on the court. Can McCormick mold the kids into a winning team -- and make himself into a better man along the way? Rebound also stars Wendy R. Robinson, Breckin Meyer, Horatio Sanz, Megan Mullally, and Patrick Warburton

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: The Avengers unite to thwart the villainous Ultron from carrying out his evil plan to extinguish all human life on planet Earth

programme.title: Jury Duty
programme.desc: Wacky comedy about an unemployed guy who tries to rolong a court case in order to continue receiving the luxuries of a juror. Tommy (Pauly Shore) is a jury member on what should be an open-and-shut murder case, but he is so contented within his luxury hotel that he is prepared to try anything to make the case seem more ambiguous. However, his fellow jurors are less than thrilled by his efforts and become more intent on killing him than on taking part in the trial! Tia Carrere co-stars as fellow juror Monica, with whom Tommy falls in love(n)

programme.title: Into the West
programme.desc: The Irish 'Into the West' is a film about two young boys, Tito and Ossie, whose father "Papa" Reillywas "King of the Travellers" until his wife, Mary, died during the birth of their second son, Ossie. The boys grandfather (David Kelly) is an old story-telling Traveller, who regales the children with Irish folk-tales and legends. When he is followed by a beautiful white horse called Tir na nOg (meaning "Land of Eternal Youth" in Irish), from the sea to Dublin, where the boys and their father have now settled down in a grim tower block in Ballymun, the boys are overwhelmed with joy and dreams of becoming cowboys. The horse is stolen from them and they begin their adventure to get their mystical horse back. They escape the poverty of a north Dublin council estate, and ride "Into the West" where they find that Tir na nOg is not just a horse(n)

programme.title: Muppets From Space
programme.desc: Our hook-nosed blue friend Gonzo is the only one of the Muppets who knows nothing about his origins and family, or even if there are any more creatures like him in the universe. Then one day, after getting messages from his breakfast cereal, he decides to set off an adventure to find out where he came from. His search leads him to believe he might be an alien, but any mention of extraterrestrial life attracts attention from Men in Black. style government agencies who want to suck out his brains to capture all his knowledge. But they've reckoned without Gonzo's friends, including Kermit the Frog and the formidable Miss Piggy. This latest slice of Muppet mania is as amusing as alwaysgreat entertainment(n)

programme.title: The Little Vampire
programme.desc: Children's fantasy. A lonely nine-year-old boy gets picked on by his classmates when his family move from California to Scotland. He dreams of vampires, and one night he meets a vegetarian vampire boy about his own age and they become friends. The vampire's family hope to become human, but they need the missing part of a magic amulet. Evading a vampire hunter, the boys set out to obtain it(n)

programme.title: Gentle Ben 2: Black Gold
programme.desc: A land baron's plan to drill on land that abuts a wilderness preserve has Ranger Jack up in arms, so much so that he soon finds himself in jail, charged with sabotaging the new well. Is the baron drilling a natural spring water well, as he claims, or is it something much more insidious, as Jack suspects? It's up to Mark and his bear companion, Ben, to clear Jack's name and discover what's really afoot in this compelling yarn - before the authorities ship Mark off to a foster home!(n)

programme.desc: Heartwarming animated story of a young Russian mouse who gets separated from his family as they are about to land in their new homeland, late 19th-century America. Setting out to find his folks, little Fievel embarks on a journey that involves him in many dangerous adventures - including an encounter with the dastardly Warren T Rat. James Horner's musical score includes the hit song 'Somewhere Out There'(n)

programme.title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
programme.desc: The animated adventures of Fievel the mouse continue in this Western sequel to Steven Spielberg 's 1986 cartoon blockbuster. When his family moves out to the Old West, Fievel gets into the gun-slinging spirit, teaming up with a dozy but wise sheriff (charmingly voiced by James Stewart) to take on a posse of bad guys(n)

programme.title: An American Tail 3: The Treasure of Manhattan Island
programme.desc: Everyone's favorite mouse adventurer returns in his most exciting quest yet. While searching for buried treasure in Old New York, Fievel and his friends discover a lost Indian mouse tribe living beneath Manhattan. This action-packed made-for-video tale is filled with plenty of laughs, heart and new songs. Voices include Thomas Dekker, Dom DeLuise, Lacey Chabert and David Carradine(n)

programme.title: Olympics 2016
programme.desc: Geno Auriemma's U.S. women's basketball squad goes to work on a remarkable sixth consecutive gold medal, facing Senegal. The talented roster ranges from 21-year-old WNBA rookie Breanna Stewart to 37-year-old Tamika Catchings, a fourth-time Olympian along with Sue Bird and Diana Taurasi

programme.title: Olympics 2016
programme.desc: Group B in men's basketball tips off with host Brazil facing Lithuania. Guard Leandro Barbosa heads the veterans joining Brazil's 2015 Pan Am Games gold medalists. Lithuania looks for a spark from NBA rookie Domantas Sabonis, son of Olympic great Arvydas, who won gold with the Soviet Union (1988) before playing for two of Lithuania's three straight bronze medalists

programme.title: Olympics 2016
programme.desc: Men's soccer (Germany vs. South Korea). Twin midfielders Sven and Lars Bender add experience to the side for Germany, whose senior national team captured the World Cup in Brazil two summers ago. Korean Seung-woo Ryu plays his club soccer in Germany

programme.title: Olympics 2016
programme.desc: Division foes this fall in the NBA, Croatia's Dario Saric (76ers) and Bojan Bogdanovic (Nets) work together in Rio against 2012 and 2008 silver-medalist Spain in a live men's basketball opener. Also: women's archery (team finals)

programme.title: Olympics 2016
programme.desc: Weightlifting (men's 56kg bantamweight and women's 53kg featherweight); and table tennis (second- and third-round play), both at the Riocentro complex. In men's singles, Kanak Jha became the first U.S. Olympian born in the 21st century

programme.title: Olympics 2016
programme.desc: Soccer-crazed host Brazil takes on Iraq at Mané Garrincha Stadium in Brasília, capping the second day of the men's group stage

programme.title: Olympics 2016
programme.desc: Men's boxing preliminaries (lightweight, welterweight and light heavyweight); and judo (women's 52kg and men's 66kg). Lightweight Carlos Balderas is the only American boxer in action

programme.title: Angels: Good or Evil
programme.desc: Trace the history of angels in various religions from the winged figures of ancient Egyptians and Greco-Romans to the cherubic do-gooders associated with modern Christianity in a documentary that boldly attempts to seek out the truth behind one of the most mysterious religious phenomenon of all times. It seems that all religions have some forms of angels and demons, and despite their slight differences, many similarities between the beings persist whether looking at the Muslim, Hebrew, or Christian faiths. But what exactly is the true role of these otherworldly beings in society or religion? Now, as experts speak with both religious experts and the everyday people who claim to have encountered these heavenly beings, believers and skeptics alike will marvel at the undeniable influence that angels have had on mass culture throughout the ages

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Data's Day. In the tradition of the "letters from camp" episodes of M*A*S*H, this Next Generation installment is based upon Data's personal records of a typical day in his life on the Enterprise . In the course of events, Data is faced with two daunting tasks. First, he must give away the bride (Rosalind Chao) at O'Brien's wedding; and last but far from least, he must escort Vulcan ambassador T'Pel (Sierra Pecheur) to a vital diplomatic rendezvous. How he juggles one crisis with the other forms the nucleus of Harold Apter and Ronald D. Moore's teleplay. "Data's Day" was originally telecast on January 12, 1991(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: An Epic Journey. This Frozen Planet special brings together the very best highlights of the series, taking viewers on a spectacular journey through the entire polar year - from the depths of winter to the melting world of the polar summer. In the south, spring starts with the comical stone-stealing Adelie penguin males. In summer the females return and the parents struggle to raise their chicks before the big freeze of autumn. In the north, tiny polar bear cubs begin their lives under the snow, while the male faces the harshest winter on Earth. Will all three cubs survive as the ice melts beneath their feet? These stories, together with unforgettable moments from Frozen Planet's other characters, play out against breathtaking polar scenery in this one-hour special. (R) (T) (Digital Dolby 5.1)(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: On Thin Ice. David Attenborough investigates the effects of rising temperatures at the polar regions(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet

programme.sub-title: To The Ends of the Earth

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Winter. During winter most animals abandon the polar regions, but a few extreme survivors remain. This is the story of their battles to endure the planet's harshest winters(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Autumn. Polar landscapes in autumn are transformed as the big freeze returns. Most animals leave on epic journeys, some now battle to breed, and for the hardy few it's a time of opportunity. In the Arctic, polar bears gather in large numbers on the coast to wait for the return of the ice. Tempers soon fray and violent contests break out. Off the coast, 2,000 beluga whales head for a special estuary, a gigantic 'whale spa', whilst inland the tundra undergoes a dramatic transformation and musk ox males and young caribou engage in very different mating rituals. Down in Antarctica, adelie penguin chicks huddle together in creches and two chicks take their first swim. It seems penguins are not born with a love of water though - and with good reason, as a leopard seal explodes from the sea in a hunting manoeuvre that has never before been captured on film. As winter approaches and the wildlife leaves, the giant emperor penguin arrives and makes an epic trek inland to breed(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Summer. In Summer, there is 24 hour daylight in the Poles. The land becomes green and productive, and there is an abundance of food for the baby animals(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Spring. Spring arrives in the polar regions, and the sun appears after an absence of five months; warmth and life return to these magical ice worlds(n)

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Race Against Time (Coasts). The coast is the dynamic border between land and sea. Powered by the tides and thrashed by waves, this is a world of continuous change. Opportunities never last long here, so hunters are always in a race against time. The coast is the only place on the planet where predators from air, land and sea come together(n)
